paper_abstract: Monoidal triangular norm logic MTL is the logic of left-continuous triangular norms. In the paper we present a relational formalization of the logic MTL and then we introduce relational dual tableau that can be used for verification of validity of MTL-formulas. We prove soundness and completeness of the system. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Dual tableau for monoidal triangular norm logic MTL
